title: Must-sees and new features
meta-description: Live the Lausanne adventure to the fullest: don’t miss any of its must-sees or news, and make your stay with us an unforgettable experience!

news.title: News
news.paragraph: Live the Lausanne adventure to the fullest: don’t miss any of its must-sees or news, and make your stay with us an unforgettable experience!

highlights.title: Lausanne highlights
highlights.paragraph: Both an urban and a lakeside resort, between lake, mountains, vineyards and forests, Lausanne captivates with its easy-going lifestyle. Voted best small city in the world, it boasts all the characteristics of a metropolis on a human scale.

agenda.title: Events not to be missed
